Wiki Community Area

Sharing your experiences.

This section of the Hibernate Wiki is open for community contribution. Useful information will be eventually incorporated into other parts of this site. Please be careful not to overwrite content from other people!

To edit this page, simply click the Edit This Page button in the top right corner. To add a new page, click List directory, followed by New document. After you have created a new page, add it to the appropriate section of this index page.

This is some example Wiki text with a link. Click Edit to see how I made it....(in the right corner.)

HTML tables also supported as well
NOW testing COOL - hip - hip hurray :)
NOW testing What about synchronization?

If you accidently remove a page that shouldn't have been removed, don't worry: We have backups, so just contact us.
